website_summaries.verdict: This set is a great option for budget-conscious shoppers who don't want to spend a fortune on boat fenders.
pros: The set comes with 2 fenders and 2 boat lines
Fenders have needle valve for easy inflating and deflating
cons: A few complaints of the fenders not holding air

customer_reviews.title: Well made at a great price - includes the rope too!
customer_reviews.text: These bumpers do a great job and are really well made. We have a 24' pontoon boat and docked up to a friends ski boat this weekend and they did an amazing job protecting both our boats during waves from the high volume holiday weekend boating traffic. If anything ever happens to these, I will order them again in a heartbeat. They were less expensive than what I saw at Walmart and the local marina and they arrived really quickly. They also come with good quality ropes too, so that was a bonus! Get them, you'll be glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Paul

customer_reviews.title: cracked/failed on the first use over a long weekend
customer_reviews.text: Used the fenders (actually used only one of the two) for the first time over a long weekend at a rental slip/marina. The fender split/failed with a half inch crack. There was nothing sharp on the dock that I could find and the tide was only one/two feet overnight. Thankfully just the fact it was there kept my boat from rubbing the dock. Would love to return/exchange but can't find a way to do so.
customer_reviews.author: topsahl

customer_reviews.title: Waiting for customer service
customer_reviews.text: One bumper was flat with a split in it on a seam. Update: Customer service came through with a replacement in a timely fashion. Overall very happy.
customer_reviews.author: EZ Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it, no marks on boat.
customer_reviews.text: First l, let me say my Malibu has never been docked or beached, we went on a 5 day lake trip that required us to rent a slip at a marina. I bought these fenders to use because I didn’t want the hard plastic fenders. These are inflatable and left absolutely NO marks on my boat. They came with enough rope to tie to the dock. I also found out They float. I highly recommend these fenders.
customer_reviews.author: Mike LV

customer_reviews.title: Good value for quality bumpers
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of bumpers with ropes included. Seem very sturdy and have worked well for us so far (only had the chance to use them a couple of times). Good value and nice to have matching bumpers and rope.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great bumpers - perfect size for 21 ft jet boat
customer_reviews.text: These are great bumpers. I’ve only used them for one season and they have held up great! I use them for my 21 ft jet boat and would strongly recommend this size for your smaller vessels. Comes with matching line which looks really nice when your standing back admiring your boat at the slip.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Scott

customer_reviews.title: High quality.
customer_reviews.text: Love these bumpers!! They match our black pontoon perfectly. It’s nice you can add air to them for the perfect fit, so to speak. High quality.
customer_reviews.author: High Country

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all
customer_reviews.text: Barely ever write a review, I'm too busy to be honest. But for this one I'm gong to. Seemed like pretty good material, as good as the big marine stores...wink wink. Was extremely surprised at the quality when I recieved it today. I thought it would be average at best considering the price. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a 24' foot boat
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a 24' foot boat. Mine is a Yamaha AR240. Get 2 packages for a total of 4 fenders. One on each cleat and one for hanging off the tower. Max protection!!!
customer_reviews.author: William D

customer_reviews.title: Protection
customer_reviews.text: Great product. On our second summer of using them and they still look great!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Bastin

customer_reviews.title: Great Fender
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 20 Sea Ray and they are great. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great buoy’s!
customer_reviews.text: These Buoy’s are perfect for our boat! It comes with the rope too and they very good quality buoys and rope. They work great.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Townsend

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty not the cheapo's
customer_reviews.text: I have not had these long but they seem to be really able to take a beating. Look good and the rope that comes with it gives you plenty of adjustment length. Beats Wal Mart!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Worked great and they held their air even as they got pounded by an 18' boat against a dock on Lake Guntersville during strong wind and white capping waves.
customer_reviews.author: schag

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for the investment
customer_reviews.text: Nice bumpers - perfect for my 25 Ft pontoon. Nice color ( I got black) and love that the bumpers came with matching line included. Seems like good quality. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: jcb62

customer_reviews.title: Best fender
customer_reviews.text: These were better than I thought thicker awesome for the boat. Love it
customer_reviews.author: maria Ransford

customer_reviews.title: Pretty thin
customer_reviews.text: Bought thinking they would last i used them twice and they don't hold air. 1 has a small cut not sure how it got cut as i only use the to tie up to other boats. im thinking they popped when a wave came in and caused the boat we were tied up to to move. causing friction between them .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect... WE already have 4 and these are perfect to add to our Pontoon boat. Great quality material and love that the cord comes with it. Great price .... and I checked around.

customer_reviews.title: work great
customer_reviews.text: so far , so good; work great on my pontoon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT !!! Awesome product and even better customer service !!!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice fenders, and were delivered promptly. 1 of the 4, however, will not hold air and was told to email their customer service. I'll update in a few and reflect their response. Hopefully, it will be resolved....I really like the fenders and are the perfect size for our 23 foot pontoon boat. Ok.......they sent a replacement right away and I am oh so happy !!! Will definitely purchase from these folks again !!

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I hit a dock chipped the gel coat put these fenders on no more chips they work perfectly!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Great package deal
customer_reviews.text: Quality and looks are really nice and we appreciated the fact that it had the ropes with it. Would highly recommend it. Our boat is 25' Four Winns and it's perfect in size.

customer_reviews.title: Great Fenders!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. Arrived quickly and use as secondary fenders on a pontoon.

customer_reviews.title: Works great in their first season
customer_reviews.text: Used on 23 foot tritoon. works great to prevent dock rash. No problems in first year of use.

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: I have used these on the boat for one whole season and they are still in good shape. My boat remains on the water and is docked daily.

customer_reviews.title: Like these fenders
customer_reviews.text: We have bought two of these - at different times - for a total of 4 fenders. They work great and have strong, heavy lines, I would have given them 5 stars, except they were supposed to come with an inflation valve. Neither order came with one.
customer_reviews.author: JAH

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Durable. Perfect size. Well made product. I Bought 2 More.

customer_reviews.title: Great fenders, High Quality and a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: These are high quality fenders, I am using on a 24 ft Hurricane Deck boat and I am very pleased. The rope is high quality and soft and the bumpers come prefilled with air and ready to use. My boat is heavy and these bumpers have protected it well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hud

customer_reviews.title: These are great! Super nice quality and look as the expensive ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Super nice quality and look as the expensive ones sold at my local marine shop, but at a huge savings!

customer_reviews.title: Great fenders for my pontoon boat
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Perfect size for my pontoon boat. I looked at several different types however these ended up being the highest quality ones o looked at. They are able to be inflated to the desired pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but poor Color
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 2 pack black. Product received was one black and one navy. Disappointed The product itself was really good quality. If I had received the colors I ordered would have been 5 stars for the money !!!
customer_reviews.author: JHess

customer_reviews.title: Huge and comes inflated. We approve - Tom Brady doesn't
customer_reviews.text: These are HUGE! But they definitely get the job done. I feel like this was a great deal for these big ol' things! They came already inflated and ready to go. The rope attached is thick and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: vanessa

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME Boat Fenders & Tie Down Ropes
customer_reviews.text: Perfect boat fenders for my Lund! Tie downs are also exactly what we hoped for. Love the black that compliments our boat color. Thanks for a very high quality product that arrived in record time.

customer_reviews.title: Nice set for a black colored boat
customer_reviews.text: Have not used yet but seem sturdy and ropes seem adequate

customer_reviews.title: Work as advertised. They do the job.
customer_reviews.text: Work as advertised. Keeps my boat from getting scratched / damaged when tied up at the dock and around other boats.

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, very well designed and the price is unbelievable. Much bigger than expected, good quality rope is also included

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure these have protected my boat in ways I will never know. I like the fact that you can pump air pressure if you need more or remove air if you need less.

customer_reviews.title: Good fender - color untrue and varies.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two packs for four total fenders – they are value priced and of decent quality. Unfortunately, each pack had one black fender and one dark blue. The description only said black and that is what I was expecting. Other than the poor color grading they do a fine job protecting my boat.

I recommend not trying to save a buck to protect your boat and spend the money on some good Taylormade Fenders

customer_reviews.title: Loved the color

customer_reviews.title: Fenders are very poor quality. Wall is not thick enough and can ...
customer_reviews.text: Fenders are very poor quality. Wall is not thick enough and can easily be cut/popped when docking. Also, air valve is type typically found on rubber balls, not fenders. I am returning for a refund.

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for keeping our pontoon from hitting against the dock ...
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for keeping our pontoon from hitting against the dock in a large marina. We had smaller ones and these saved the boat. Perfect size and two have been sufficient to protect the boat . Rope and buoy are excellent quality and material that should last.

customer_reviews.title: Colors Are Off...
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to have been a black set. Instead these are one black and one a very dark mavy blue. I hate it when things don't match, and these definately don't. Other than that, they are fully functional and do their job as bumpers.

The lines are very nice too. These also come pre-inflated which is nice because I have no idea where our pump is. Will update the review in the future if there are any issues.

They were a bit deflated when they arrived, but still usable as shipped. We decided to get a needle for the air compressor and add some air to both.

product_meta.title: Extreme Max 3006.7204 BoatTector Fender Value 2-Pack - 6.5" x 22", Black
product_meta.description: Protect your boat without putting a dent in your wallet. BoatTector fenders offer superior protection for your docked boat, taking the beating of wind and waves so your boat doesn’t have to. Included in the Value Pack are two premium 6” x 22” BoatTector fenders and two 3/8” x 5’ fender lines. Each fender is equipped with a needle valve allowing any sports ball pump to inflate the fender to give you the custom psi you want and a molded eyelet to ensure fender longevity and strength.
feature_bullets: Includes two 6. 5” x 22” BoatTector fenders and two 3/8” x 5' fender lines
Equipped with a needle valve to inflate or deflate each fender to a desired pressure (needle valve pump not included)
Reinforced molded eyelets ensure longevity and strength

specifications.Cover Included: Extreme Max 3006.7204 BoatTector Inflatable Fender Value 2-Pack - 6.5" x 22", Black
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars320 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
